pkgmetadata.longdescription: Recursive Non-Additive Emulator for Multi-Fidelity Data // Performs RNA emulation and active learning proposed by Heo and Sung (2025) doi:10.1080/00401706.2024.2376173 for multi- fidelity computer experiments. The RNA emulator is particularly useful when the simulations with different fidelity level are nonlinearly correlated. The hyperparameters in the model are estimated by maximum likelihood estimation.
